sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-container role="main" style="min-height: 100vh">
    <Header @navClick="handleNavClick" />
    <el-main style="padding: 0">
      <el-tabs v-model="activeTab" type="card" closable @tab-remove="removeTab">
        <el-tab-pane
            v-for="tab in tabs"
            :key="tab.route"
            :label="tab.label"
            :name="tab.route">
        </el-tab-pane>
      </el-tabs>
      <!-- 路由内容区域 -->
      <router-view />
    </el-main>
  </el-container>
</template>

<script>
import Header from "./components/Header.vue"
export default {
  name: "App",
  components: { Header },
  data() {
    return {
      tabs: [],
      activeTab: ''
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handleNavClick(route) {
      // 如果该标签页不存在，则添加
      let tab = this.tabs.find(t => t.route === route);
      if (!tab) {
        let label = "";
        switch (route) {
          case '/online-resources':
            label = "在线资源";
            break;
          case '/online-consult':
            label = "在线咨询";
            break;
          case '/ai-learning':
            label = "AI辅助学习";
            break;
          case '/login':
            label = "登录";
            break;
          case '/register':
            label = "注册";
            break;
          case '/profile':
            label = "个人资料";
            break;
          default:
            label = route;
        }
        this.tabs.push({ route, label });
      }
      this.activeTab = route;
      this.$router.push(route);
    },
    removeTab(targetName) {
      let tabs = this.tabs;
      let activeTab = this.activeTab;
      if (activeTab === targetName) {
        tabs.forEach((tab, index) => {
          if (tab.route === targetName) {
            const nextTab = tabs[index - 1] || tabs[index + 1];
            if (nextTab) {
              activeTab = nextTab.route;
            }
          }
        });
      }
      this.activeTab = activeTab;
      this.tabs = tabs.filter(tab => tab.route !== targetName);
      this.$router.push(activeTab);
    }
  },
  created() {
    // 默认添加首页标签（假设首页为在线资源页面）
    this.tabs.push({ route: '/online-resources', label: '在线资源' });
    this.activeTab = '/online-resources';
    this.$router.push('/online-resources');
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
/* 可根据需要调整 */
</style>
